rows.label: qev013105_MSG0001
rows.name: PRESENT KEY TO OPEN SAFE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0002
rows.name: SCANNING...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0003
rows.name: VALIDATING...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0005
rows.name:
KEY ONE OF FOUR VERIFIED.
PLEASE PRESENT NEXT KEY.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0006
rows.name:
Ha ha! Get a load of this idiot!
Works every time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0007
rows.name:
Lemme clue you in, [ST:playername ].
That safe only opens with all four of our keys.
One for each survivor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_JNK0010
rows.name: Insist

rows.label: qev013105_SEL0011
rows.name: Demand to know if they were all in on it from the start.

rows.label: qev013105_JNK0020
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev013105_SEL0021
rows.name: Inquire about there being four keys.

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0008
rows.name:
Surprised? They always are.
Isn't that right, Fosdyke?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0009
rows.name:
Don't you worry about the number of keys!
You won't live to see that safe opened anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0010
rows.name: One more nosy fool taken care of, eh, Fosdyke?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0011
rows.name:
Oh, indeed. Once they hear a tale of sordid betrayal,
such do-gooders are all too eager to lend a hand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0012
rows.name:
They'll doubt one side or the other,
but no one thinks to doubt the entire story.
We humans are such a simple lot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0013
rows.name:
And speaking of simple, you've made your
own disposal quite convenient. No one will
ever find you out here, let alone suspect us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0014
rows.name:
Briggs, you should have been an actor.
Even I bought that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0015
rows.name: Is that supposed to be sarcasm, kid?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0016
rows.name:
And forget simpleâ€”people are just greedy.
Risking their lives to come scrounge for a
shiny pile of metal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0017
rows.name: Like you can talk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0018
rows.name: Or you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0019
rows.name: And double for you. Now let's finish up here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0020
rows.name: PRESENT KEY TO OPEN SAFE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0021
rows.name: SCANNING...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0022
rows.name: VALIDATING...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0024
rows.name:
KEY ONE OF FOUR VERIFIED.
PLEASE PRESENT NEXT KEY.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0025
rows.name: So Briggs got offed, did he?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0026
rows.name: Should've worked on his acting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0027
rows.name:
Heh. You look like you've seen a ghost.
Need me to catch you up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev013105_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask what's going on.

rows.label: qev013105_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev013105_SEL0041
rows.name: Refuse to listen to one more word.

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0028
rows.name:
I fear that's a secret for the Celeste Three.
...Well, Four, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0029
rows.name:
Careful, Fosdyke. This one's got more bite
than the others up till now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0030
rows.name:
Huh. Looks like this one's sharper than the others
up till now. Keep your wits about you, Fosdyke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0031
rows.name: Perhaps. Still, it's nothing we can't handle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013105_MSG0032
rows.name:
You can ask Briggs to fill you in when you
meet him in hell![ST:wait ]
